name: Joe Black 'Satan In A Sunday Hat' CD - Cabaret, Alternative, Comedy, Evil, Vaudeville
description:
Satan In A Sunday Hat.

The first ever cabaret to be recorded in the bowels of hell!
Join Joe Black and a cast of his most devious friends as we explore deep into the realms of evil and our ever looming destruction.



TRACK LIST

1. Intro (Featuring - Aurelio Voltaire)
2. Warning
3. Satan In A Sunday Hat
4. Drink It Down
5. Radio #1 (Feat. Andrew O'Neill)
6. If You Leave Me I'll Kill You
7. Jolene
8. You Are My Sunshine
9. How To Get Away With Murder (Feat. Marcella Puppini)
10. Radio #2 (Feat. Dick Biglione)
11. Missed Me (Feat. Ribbon)
12. Dirt In The Ground
13. The Hymn Of The Hopeful Damned
14. The Apocalypse Song


The Cast -

Joe Black - Vocals, Lyrics, Piano, Accordion, Ukulele, Glockenspiel, Acoustic Guitar, Toy Piano

Sam Carter-Brazier - Producer, Electric Guitar, Guest Vocals

Marcella Puppini - Guest Vocals

Adrian Stout - Double Bass, Theremin, Musical Saw, Guest Vocals

Mishkin Fitzgerald - Auto Harp, Guest Vocals

Michaela Ryall - Guest Vocals

Luke Sargeant - Drums, Percussion, Guest Vocals

Aurelio Voltaire - Guest Voice (Intro)

Andrew O'Neill - Guest Voice (Radio Presenter #1)

Dick Biglione - Guest Voice (Radio Presenter #2)

Arran Shurvinton - Guest Vocals, Front and Back CD Cover Paintings

Scott Chalmers - Design, Photography, Putting Up With Nonsense

Joe Marsh - Album Mastering



All songs written by Joe Black.
Except tracks 7, 8, 11 & 12.
Track 7/Jolene - Written by Dolly Parton.
Track 8/You Are My Sunshine - Traditional Song
Track 11/Missed Me - Written by Amanda Palmer
Track 12/Dirt In The Ground - Written by Tom Waits & Kathleen Brennan.

name: Joe Black 'Ouija Board' Tshirts! - UNISEX - SMALL, MEDIUM AND LARGE AVAILABLE
description:
Joe Black 'Ouija Board' Tshirts! 

UNISEX - SMALL, MEDIUM AND LARGE AVAILABLE



BLACK TSHIRTS WITH LIGHT GREY PRINT. SOFT STYLE MATERIAL.


CURRENTLY ON SALE - £8!!!


Now ladies and gents... You can go about your daily business with a Joe Black occult item displayed on your body!
Take the kids to school! Buy bread! Take your pet raccoon for a walk! Cover your modesty! Multi functional tshirts for your delight!

Buy them now! Wear them when they arrive in the post! Sleep in it! Make love to people in it! Never take it off!

name: Joe Black 'Ouija Board' Tote Bag!
description:
Joe Black 'Ouija Board' Tote Bag!

Use this lovely occult themed tote bag to carry your gin... your laptop... or even your cat!

CURRENTLY ON SALE! £8!

Dimensions of the bags are 380mm wide x 410mm deep.
The top of the bag to the apex of the handle measures 380mm.

100% Cotton

name: Joe Black - 'Vile Volumes for Villainous Children' CD - Cabaret, Vaudeville, Halloween, Comedy
description:
Joe Black 'Vile Volumes for Villainous Children' 13 track CD

Joe Black invites you into a world where death is a laughing matter, where love songs are truly sickening and where the gin flows free.
Vile Volumes for Villainous Children explores the darker side of how we deal with ourselves in a series of painfully honest, hilarious and at times disturbing ditties.

Don't say we didn't warn you.


TRACK LIST


1. INTRO

2. Vile Volumes for Villainous Children

3. Alphabet Song

4. Wrong Channel, Sorry

5. Swamp Song (Tom Waits not all that long)

6. Child Catcher (2009)

7. Monday Club

8. Wrong Channel, Really sorry

9. Emotional Weeble

10. Sick Love Sick Love Song

11. Wrong Channel. No. Really. Sorry

12. The End Song

13. The End Poem

name: Choice of Pocket Mirror! (Loki Demonseed Cartoon Designs) - FREE P&P
description:
SOLD OUT!


Joe Black pocket mirrors! designs courtesy of the wonderful Loki Demonseed of the Dublin (IRELAND!) 'Nom Nom Collective'

now you can check to make sure your makeup is suitably down your face. always keeping up to date with that 'i've been crying for hours' look that is oh so popular nowadays!

 

58mm (2 1/4 inch) pocket mirrors
